0.Major_Activities1:
We have been training girls in various activities like tailoring, spoken English, dance, basics of computer and gardening etc. During weekends we  organise classes for personality development and career counselling. We also often organise talks from people who are pioneers in their field and take the children for field trips to places of importance in and around Leh.
Some of our notable alumni are - Jigmet Dolma (Elite Category Marathon Runner) and Tsewang Chorol (Member of Indian Ice Hockey.
